Generation VII.Sun: It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. Witnesses observed it flying across the sky at high speed.
Generation VII.Moon: One kind of Ultra Beast. Witnesses have seen it burn down a forest by expelling gas from its two arms.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: One of the dangerous UBs, high energy readings can be detected coming from both of its huge arms.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Although it's alien to this world and a danger here, it's apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.

Generation VII.Moon: Haina Desert or Malie Garden ( Only two for either location)

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure ) ( Only one , requires unlocking the They Came From The Ultra Beyond! adventure)
